title: All types of scripts in roblox studio explained! #roblox  #scripting  #tutorial
transcript: What are the differences between the different scripts in Roblox Studio? So to start with the normal scripts, these scripts are called server scripts. Basically, they run on the server. So they have something called global game logic and they handle it and also everyone sees the effects of these scripts. So to summarize it, they pretty much handle all player data and data in general. So now for the local scripts, basically these scripts run on the client, meaning that they manage what the player actually sees. So, if you think about it, they handle things like UI, camera, and player input, and they only affect the local player's experience. So, the player on that client. So, now for the most complicated type of script, the module script. They basically define reusable functions and data, and they mostly keep your code organized. They're pretty complicated, but that's mainly what they do. Check out blocksacademy.com for personalized scripting tutoring
